charges.charge_description: 18:1349; CONSPIRACY TO COMMIT BANK AND WIRE FRAUD; Conspiracy.(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to 32 months incarceration to run concurrently; 3 years of supervised release to run concurrently; $100 special assessment.

charges.charge_description: 18:1343 and 18:2; FRAUD BY WIRE, RADIO, OR TELEVISION; Wire Fraud and Aiding and Abetting.(2)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to 32 months incarceration to run concurrently; 3 years of supervised release to run concurrently; $100 special assessment.
